name: Cordimon Imperial
description: Stegman's classic worker's jacket has been a staple of job sites for over seventy years. This duotone pattern is cut from the toughest material meaning you can wear it anywhere, anytime. It may not be armor, but it damn sure feels like it.
description_cn: 施特格曼的经典款工服夹克是七十多年来工作现场的必备品.这款双色调夹克是由最坚韧的材料剪裁而成,无论在哪都能穿.也许它不是护甲,但这感觉真特么像护甲.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-特雷斯勒太空站-CargoOffice
